title: ButtonProps
body:
# ButtonProps

A customizable button component

## Properties
| Name | Type | Optional | Description |
| :--- | :--- | :------- | :---------- |
| `variant` | `'primary' | 'secondary' | 'danger'` | Yes | - |

| `children` | `React.ReactNode` | No | - |
